definitions.definition: A simple carbocyclic sugar ( hexahydroxycyclohexane ; chemical formula : C 6 H 12 O 6 ) which occurs in animal and plant tissue. Once treated as part of the vitamin B complex , but is not a vitamin as it can be synthesized by the body.

main_definition: ( biochemistry ) A simple carbocyclic sugar ( hexahydroxycyclohexane ; chemical formula : C 6 H 12 O 6 ) which occurs in animal and plant tissue. Once treated as part of the vitamin B complex , but is not a vitamin as it can be synthesized by the body.
